insert into mission_orders (mission_order_id, mission_order_num, user_id, mission_id, order_time, finish_time, state) values (#{missionOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{missionOrderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{missionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update mission_orders set mission_order_num = #{missionOrderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mission_id = #{missionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where mission_order_id = #{missionOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mission_order_id, mission_order_num, user_id, mission_id, order_time, finish_time, state from mission_orders where mission_order_id = #{missionOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select mission_order_id, mission_order_num, user_id, mission_id, order_time, finish_time, state from mission_orders
